name: MEMORIES OF MARS
description: 100 years in the future Mars is a broken dream. Survive the harsh conditions of the Red planet. Face environmental dangers, explore the planet, scavenge and gather resources, 3D print your tools and weapons and learn new skills.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (AMD FX 6300). Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 14 GB available space Additional Notes: Install to SSD Drive
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-7600K (AMD Ryzen 5-1600) Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 14 GB available space Additional Notes: Install to SSD Drive
